TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Utf8 extends System.Object

Docs.summary: UTF8 Helper methods and routines.
Docs.remarks: The term "rune" is used to represent a Unicode code point merely because it is a shorter way of talking about it.

MemberSignature.Value: public Utf8 ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ValueTuple<uint,int> DecodeLastRune (NStack.ustring str, int end = -1);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<unsigned int32, int32> DecodeLastRune(class NStack.ustring str, int32 end) cil managed

Docs.param: String to decode rune from; if it is empty, it returns (RuneError, 0). Otherwise, if the encoding is invalid, it returns (RuneError, 1). Both are impossible results for correct, non-empty UTF-8.
Scan up to that point, if the value is -1, it sets the value to the lenght of the buffer.
Docs.summary: DecodeLastRune unpacks the last UTF-8 encoding in the ustring.
Docs.returns: The last rune and its width in bytes.
Docs.remarks: An encoding is invalid if it is incorrect UTF-8, encodes a rune that is out of range, or is not the shortest possible UTF-8 encoding for the value. No other validation is performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ValueTuple<uint,int> DecodeLastRune (byte[] buffer, int end = -1);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<unsigned int32, int32> DecodeLastRune(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 end) cil managed

Docs.param: Buffer to decode rune from; if it is empty, it returns (RuneError, 0). Otherwise, if the encoding is invalid, it returns (RuneError, 1). Both are impossible results for correct, non-empty UTF-8.
Scan up to that point, if the value is -1, it sets the value to the lenght of the buffer.
Docs.summary: DecodeLastRune unpacks the last UTF-8 encoding in buffer
Docs.returns: The last rune and its width in bytes.
Docs.remarks: An encoding is invalid if it is incorrect UTF-8, encodes a rune that is out of range, or is not the shortest possible UTF-8 encoding for the value. No other validation is performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ValueTuple<uint,int> DecodeRune (NStack.ustring str, int start = 0, int n = -1);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<unsigned int32, int32> DecodeRune(class NStack.ustring str, int32 start, int32 n) cil managed

Docs.param: Number of bytes valid in the buffer, or -1 to make it the lenght of the buffer.
Docs.summary: DecodeRune unpacks the first UTF-8 encoding in the ustring returns the rune and its width in bytes.
Docs.returns: If p is empty it returns (RuneError, 0). Otherwise, if the encoding is invalid, it returns (RuneError, 1). Both are impossible results for correct, non-empty UTF-8.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ValueTuple<uint,int> DecodeRune (byte[] buffer, int start = 0, int n = -1);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.ValueTuple`2<unsigned int32, int32> DecodeRune(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 start, int32 n) cil managed

Docs.param: Byte buffer containing the utf8 string.
Number of bytes valid in the buffer, or -1 to make it the lenght of the buffer.
Docs.summary: DecodeRune unpacks the first UTF-8 encoding in p and returns the rune and its width in bytes.
Docs.returns: If p is empty it returns (RuneError, 0). Otherwise, if the encoding is invalid, it returns (RuneError, 1). Both are impossible results for correct, non-empty UTF-8.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int EncodeRune (uint rune, byte[] dest, int offset = 0);
.method public static hidebysig int32 EncodeRune(unsigned int32 rune, unsigned int8[] dest, int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes into the destination buffer starting at offset the UTF8 encoded version of the rune
Docs.returns: The number of bytes written into the destination buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool FullRune (NStack.ustring str);
.method public static hidebysig bool FullRune(class NStack.ustring str) cil managed

Docs.summary: FullRune reports whether the ustring begins with a full UTF-8 encoding of a rune. An invalid encoding is considered a full Rune since it will convert as a width-1 error rune.
Docs.returns: true, if the bytes in p begin with a full UTF-8 encoding of a rune, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool FullRune (byte[] p);
.method public static hidebysig bool FullRune(unsigned int8[] p) cil managed

Docs.summary: FullRune reports whether the bytes in p begin with a full UTF-8 encoding of a rune. An invalid encoding is considered a full Rune since it will convert as a width-1 error rune.
Docs.returns: true, if the bytes in p begin with a full UTF-8 encoding of a rune, false otherwise.
